title: Eamon Byrne - Biotechnology Consulting
text:
About Me
Iâ€™m Eamon Byrne, PhD, a scientist and consultant with expertise in protein engineering, gene therapy, cell-based therapeutics, and translational biotech. I help startups, researchers, faculty and tech transfer offices transform their science into funded projects and real-world impact. Clients value my ability to combine deep technical expertise with strategic insight to craft winning proposals and commercialization strategies.
Trained at Oxford and Stanford and seasoned in San Franciscoâ€™s biotech startup ecosystem, I bring a global perspective, rigorous scientific training, and cross-sector experience spanning academia, startups, and industry â€” bridging the gap between discovery and commercialization.

title: Eamon Byrne - Biotechnology Consulting
text:
How I Help



Grant Strategy


Design competitive SBIR/STTR and state grant proposals (e.g.Â NM S&T Business Start-Up Grants).
